price: Atasema: Mlikaa muda gani katika ardhi kwa hisabu ya miaka?.
arabic: قَٰلَ كَمۡ لَبِثۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ عَدَدَ سِنِينَ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu atawaambia makafiri: Mliishi miaka mingapi huko duniani?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla kam labith'tum fī al-arḍi ʿadada sinīna
